title: With The Band
description:
After walking for hours through the desert, I’m ready to give up on hitchhiking.

Then I’m picked up by a rock star.

Blake’s not just famous. Not just crazy-talented. Not just heart-stoppingly handsome, either.He’s also gentle. Funny. So considerate, my chest hurts. And I’ve done the dumbest thing in the world.I got attached. Fell in love with a world famous musician, never mind that I’m half his age and I’m only with him for a short time. I’ve got nothing to offer a man like Blake, and yet with each passing day, I fall deeper.This can’t go on.I left home to prove to myself I could be brave.Well, here goes nothing. I’m gunning for the rock star.
With The Band is a short and steamy instalove story, starring a gorgeous older musician and the hitchhiker who turns his world upside down.
author: Cassie Mint
